channel.title: Code of Conduct on
channel.description: Recent content in Code of Conduct on

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: This code of conduct outlines our expectations for participants within the Matrix community, as well as steps for reporting unacceptable behaviour. We are committed to providing a welcoming and inspiring community for all, and expect our code of conduct to be honoured. Anyone who violates this code of conduct may be banned from the community. This applies to communication in any room of the Python community Matrix Space #python-community:matrix.org and commits and comments relating to any project in the matrix-python GitHub space.

item.title: Contribute to the Website
item.description: âš Make sure to read the Code of Conduct first. Create an issue Bug report Feature request Contribute to the website You will find the code of this website on GitHub: GitHub https://github.com/matrix-python/site The repository has two branches with infinite lifetime: The master branch is protected and it gets updated on every release. The develop branch is the default/merging branch. When you are working with the repo make sure to follow the GitHub flow and the Conventional Commits Specification.
